file_content.text: You saved a lot of refugee lives, you know. How's it feel to be a hero?
I hear that I have you to thank for the sudden drop in activity.
With those snipers out of commission, the refugees have a fighting chance of making it here alive.
Valor like yours must be rewarded. A week's pay, as promised--and my gratitude. Damn fine work.
Not many refugees making it back to the camp these days. Sad, really.
